Post-Match Reflections: Ramírez finished with 39 homers, leaving him one short of becoming the seventh player in MLB history to hit 40 homers and steal 40 bases in the same season.
Cleveland’s jump in the standings after winning 76 games in 2023 also led to a bump in attendance as the Guardians drew more than 2 million fans at home for the first time since 2017.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The regular season finale between the Guardians and Houston Astros was canceled Sunday after a lengthy delay
Houston set to open its AL wild-card series at home on Tuesday
A forecast of steady rain expected for several more hours
The game never started and was called following a 3-hour, 5-minute delay
Ramírez also ended with 41 steals and 39 doubles, one shy of a rare 40-40-40 season
